channel.title: Comments on: Developer, can do new tricks, require good home
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.content:encoded:
Aye Denis, it’s a nightmare and I am not sure why, could be a combination of Windows and Java being crap and not working to great together or a buggy installer.

I just decided to test out my instructions and found there are even more permutations of installation gotcha’s and work around’s…oh well at least it’s fuel for the new blog entry.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Ah yes Oracle....not sure what is worse installing or uninstalling/deinstalling it
item.content:encoded: Ah yes Oracle….not sure what is worse installing or uninstalling/deinstalling it
